newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk c. bank drains 10.3 trln o/n after auction.
newsitem.headline: Turk c. bank drains 10.3 trln o/n after auction.

text.p: 1410 GMT - Turkish c. bank drained 10.3 trln lira at 52 pct overnight, lent 6.5 trln lira at 71 pct via t/n due to expected cash shortage for Wednesday. * Treasury sold 280 trln lira of 11-mo bills at lower yld. Banks to pay 134.3 trln lira on Wednesday for auction and 47.7 trln lira to c.bank for maturing repos. * Bond ylds rose about 1.5-2 points in quiet, pre-auction trade. * Lira eased to 153,800 vs dollar from Monday's 153,350 close on higher dollar/mark.
